snippet.title: Elf Bowling 1 & 2 (GBA) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Ignition Entertainment's 2005 Game Boy Advance Christmas-themed, elf-studded bowling and shuffleboard extravaganza, Elf Bowling 1 & 2.

Okay, maybe extravaganza is a bit much. I play through both games one after another. The first is standards bowling using elves as pins, the second is shuffleboard using elves as pucks.

I think the major problem with this title is that it was a port of a browser-based Flash game with very little substance added to justify a retail release. It's certainly not bad for a Flash game, but a physical release (no matter how cheap) really needs more than 5-10 minutes of content. Some of the voice clips are pretty funny, though, and a couple were pretty unexpectedly raunchy which helped things :)

My recommendation: try it out, enjoy it for a few minutes, and then don't bother with it again. Preferably for free through the web app.
_____
No cheats were used during the recording of this video.
